roleset.name: to damage, to disfigure
roleset.note: BLEMISH-V NOTES: example found in the BNC (from blemish.01-v predicate notes)
BLEMISH-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry blemish.01, OntoNotes grouping blemish-n sense 2; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from blemish.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: He touched the long, dark green curtains, looked out into the garden and over it at the house beyond, tall and dark, A dim sodium-yellow glow filled the sky;patchy snow blemished the garden.

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: a blemish on Finland 's international reputation

example.name: Arg 1 and MNR
example.text: She decided to overlook the moral blemishes of his past.

example.name: Arg 0
example.text: Blemishes from wind and insects make citrus fruit unappetizing.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Once Rook'Shir was executed by the first Imperial Guard, his blemish on Shi'ar history and his weapon was kept secret for centuries to come.
